name: RealHomes Currency Switcher
author: InspiryThemes

sections.description:
This plugin works only with RealHomes WordPress Real Estate Theme.

Provides multiple currencies support and currency switching functionality for RealHomes theme.

Plugin includes translation files for Spanish, Italian, French, German, Turkish and Portuguese languages.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

Method 1: Manual Installation via FTP

  1. Extract the Contents: Locate the downloaded realhomes-currency-switcher.zip file and extract its contents using your preferred file decompression tool.
  2. Upload to WordPress: Using an FTP client or your web hosting control panel’s file manager, upload the extracted realhomes-currency-switcher folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory on your WordPress website’s server.
  3. Activate the Plugin: Log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the ‘Plugins’ menu, and find RealHomes Currency Switcher in the list of available plugins. Click ‘Activate’ to enable the plugin’s features on your site.

Method 2: Install Directly Through WordPress

  1. Access the WordPress Dashboard: Log in to your WordPress site’s backend.
  2. Navigate to Plugins: On the dashboard menu, click on ‘Plugins’, then select ‘Add New’.
  3. Search for the Plugin: In the ‘Search plugins…’ box, type in RealHomes Currency Switcher.
  4. Install the Plugin: Locate RealHomes Currency Switcher in the search results, click ‘Install Now’ and wait for the installation to complete.
  5. Activate the Plugin: After installation, click ‘Activate’ to start using the plugin on your website.
sections.faq:
Can this plugin work standalone?

No, this plugin works only with RealHomes WordPress real estate theme.
sections.changelog:
1.0.9

  • Improved entry file information
  • Improved readme.txt and readme.md file
  • Updated language file
  • Tested plugin with WordPress 6.6.0

1.0.8

  • Added digital currency support
  • Added plugin action links
  • Improved version management code
  • Improved settings layout and design
  • Improved entry file information
  • Improved readme.txt file
  • Updated language file
  • Tested plugin with WordPress 6.5.2

1.0.7

  • Improved plugin version utilization
  • Updated language file
  • Tested plugin with WordPress 6.2

1.0.6

  • Add settings link to plugin actions.
  • Tested plugin with WordPress 6.0.1

1.0.5

  • Updated outdated and incorrect currency symbols.
  • Tested plugin with WordPress 5.9.3

1.0.4

  • Added ‘Auto Select Active Currency’ option.
  • Improved data validation in some areas.
  • Updated POT language file.
  • Tested plugin with WordPress 5.7.2

1.0.3

  • Ensured the Currencies App ID and Currencies data before displaying the currency switcher.
  • Tested plugin with WordPress 5.6.2

1.0.2

  • Improved currency switching code to work with cache enabled sites.
  • Tested plugin with WordPress 5.5.1

1.0.1

  • Tested plugin with WordPress 5.5

1.0.0

  • Initial Release.
